title: Workshop on Cognitive Load Theory-Based Multimedia English Instructional Design

context.prior_knowledge: Expert-level knowledge and experience in solving complex problems
context.additional_context: Short-term intensive instructional design capacity-building program for pre-service and in-service teachers

learning_goals: Learners can explain the five core principles of Cognitive Load Theory (CLT) and apply them to actual lesson design
Learners can design instructional materials that reduce cognitive load on working memory by over 30% through optimal combinations of video, audio, and text
Learners can propose more than three divided-attention prevention strategies executable in smartphone-based environments

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
